name: Rough Waves
summary: Maintaining peace and order on the remote archipelagos of the Cordial Union is not an easy job, and the crew of the patrol hovercraft "Tomato Sardine" certainly have their hands full with all kinds of mercenaries, pirates and mad scientists marauding, plundering and swindling across their beat. It's up to you to uphold justice and wreck stuff in this retro-style vehicular action game made on GZDoom engine.
